alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 3:26PM CDT until April 17 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just east of Minden, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, Minden, Grambling, Arcadia, Gibsland, Dubach, Simsboro, Vienna, Athens, Holly Springs, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Corinth, Unionville and Ada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
